metadata.title: CVE-2022-1240 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in libr/bin/format/mach0/mach0.c in GitHub repositoryradareorg/radare2 prior to 5.8.6. If address sanitizer is disabled duringthe compiling, the program should executes into the `r_str_ncpy` function.Therefore I think it is very likely to be exploitable. For more generaldescription of heap buffer overflow, see[CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/122.html).

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
